text: ٱصْلَوْهَا|Burn therein|100|127|14529$ٱلْيَوْمَ|this Day|74|128|2217$بِمَا|because|75|130|43$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|166|214$تَكْفُرُونَ|disbelieve.`|97|124|289$

name: Kids
text: ٱلْيَوْمَ|This Day|77|90|2217$نَخْتِمُ|We will seal|97|123|14530$عَلَىٰٓ|[on]|63|89|52$أَفْوَٲهِهِمْ|their mouths,|108|134|3203$وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ|and will speak to Us|152|178|14531$أَيْدِيهِمْ|their hands,|99|112|757$وَتَشْهَدُ|and will bear witness|158|172|14532$أَرْجُلُهُم|their feet|91|120|14533$بِمَا|about what|96|125|43$كَانُواْ|they used (to)|117|146|94$يَكْسِبُونَ|earn.|97|112|759$

name: Kids
text: وَلَوْ|And if|58|80|179$نَشَآءُ|We willed,|87|130|5786$لَطَمَسْنَا|We (would have) surely obliterated|253|296|14534$عَلَىٰٓ|[over]|63|106|52$أَعْيُنِهِمْ|their eyes,|91|113|7292$فَٱسْتَبَقُواْ|then they (would) race|174|197|14535$ٱلصِّرَٲطَ|(to find) the path,|142|189|17$فَأَنَّىٰ|then how|82|129|5860$يُبْصِرُونَ|(could) they see?|137|160|7019$

name: Kids
text: وَلَوْ|And if|58|73|179$نَشَآءُ|We willed|82|112|5786$لَمَسَخْنَـٰهُمْ|surely, We (would have) transformed them|304|334|14536$عَلَىٰ|in|63|93|52$مَكَانَتِهِمْ|their places|97|112|14537$فَمَا|then not|77|93|132$ٱسْتَطَـٰعُواْ|they would have been able|199|232|1902$مُضِيًّا|to proceed|92|125|14538$وَلَا|and not|71|104|25$يَرْجِعُونَ|return.|105|121|3002$

name: Kids
text: وَمَن|And (he) whom|121|141|1012$نُّعَمِّرْهُ|We grant him long life,|169|209|14539$نُنَكِّسْهُ|We reverse him|122|162|14540$فِى|in|48|88|89$ٱلْخَلْقِ‌ۖ|the creation.|106|126|6513$أَفَلَا|Then will not|105|318|452$يَعْقِلُونَ|they use intellect?|143|356|1435$

name: Kids
text: لِّيُنذِرَ|To warn|74|85|10605$مَن|(him) who|86|107|76$كَانَ|is|57|78|913$حَيًّا|alive|52|73|11116$وَيَحِقَّ|and may be proved true|179|200|14543$ٱلْقَوْلُ|the Word|81|102|8490$عَلَى|against|68|79|52$ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ|the disbelievers.|128|128|364$

name: Kids
text: وَذَلَّلْنَـٰهَا|And We have tamed them|192|223|14546$لَهُمْ|for them,|81|144|98$فَمِنْهَا|so some of them -|142|205|14547$رَكُوبُهُمْ|they ride them,|122|153|14548$وَمِنْهَا|and some of them|139|364|6331$يَأْكُلُونَ|they eat.|86|311|2469$

name: Kids
text: وَلَهُمْ|And for them|106|135|71$فِيهَا|therein|66|124|253$مَنَـٰفِعُ|(are) benefits|111|169|12078$وَمَشَارِبُ‌ۖ|and drinks,|110|168|14549$أَفَلَا|so (will) not|99|128|452$يَشْكُرُونَ|they give thanks?|138|138|6484$

name: Kids
text: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ|But they have taken|156|163|10857$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|115|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|67|2$ءَالِهَةً|gods,|72|86|5479$لَّعَلَّهُمْ|that they may|115|129|1621$يُنصَرُونَ|be helped.|110|117|477$

name: Kids
text: لَا|Not|43|61|30$يَسْتَطِيعُونَ|they are able|124|160|2457$نَصْرَهُمْ|to help them,|109|145|14550$وَهُمْ|but they -|89|125|256$لَهُمْ|for them|76|112|98$جُندٌ|(are) host(s)|106|124|14551$مُّحْضَرُونَ|(who will) be brought.|166|166|13710$

name: Kids
text: فَلَا|So (let) not|98|105|208$يَحْزُنكَ|grieve you|89|103|3528$قَوْلُهُمْ‌ۘ|their speech.|107|121|7526$إِنَّا|Indeed, We|96|110|120$نَعْلَمُ|[We] know|92|106|3481$مَا|what|53|67|262$يُسِرُّونَ|they conceal|106|113|743$وَمَا|and what|82|324|46$يُعْلِنُونَ|they declare.|108|350|744$

name: Kids
text: وَضَرَبَ|And he sets forth|136|148|14552$لَنَا|for Us|59|82|338$مَثَلاً|an example|94|117|261$وَنَسِىَ|and forgets|96|119|10861$خَلْقَهُۥ‌ۖ|his (own) creation.|146|169|11457$قَالَ|He says,|77|89|309$مَن|`Who|57|77|76$يُحْىِ|will give life|96|136|2306$ٱلْعِظَـٰمَ|(to) the bones|117|158|12233$وَهِىَ|while they|88|128|2320$رَمِيمٌ|(are) decomposed?`|155|175|14553$

name: Kids
text: أَوَلَيْسَ|Is it not|82|93|14558$ٱلَّذِى|(He) Who|83|105|138$خَلَقَ|created|71|93|299$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|137|351$وَٱلْأَرْضَ|and the earth|111|133|2280$بِقَـٰدِرٍ|Able|70|92|14559$عَلَىٰٓ|to|63|74|52$أَن|[that]|60|70|655$يَخْلُقَ|create|71|91|10558$مِثْلَهُم‌ۚ|(the) like of them.|141|161|10559$بَلَىٰ|Yes, indeed!|102|122|772$وَهُوَ|and He|66|86|305$ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ|(is) the Supreme Creator|185|195|9841$ٱلْعَلِيمُ|the All-Knower.|122|122|342$

name: Kids
text: فَسُبْحَـٰنَ|So glorified be|114|129|11753$ٱلَّذِى|(He) Who|83|112|138$بِيَدِهِۦ|in Whose hand|117|146|2122$مَلَكُوتُ|is (the) dominion|131|160|12357$كُلِّ|(of) all|64|93|185$شَىْءٍ|things,|69|84|186$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|305|2165$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|370|297$
